---
title: "State Unemployment Impact Map"
format: html
editor: visual
---

```{r}
#| include: FALSE
library(tidyverse)
library(sf)
library(tmap)
library(geodata)

unemployment <- read.csv("State_COVID19_Impact.csv")

tmap_options(basemap.server = "OpenStreetMap")
tmap_mode("view")
```


```{r}

unemployment <- unemployment 

state_unemployment <- unemployment |> 
  group_by(State) |> 
  summarize(Unemployed_2020 = sum(Unemployed_2020)) 

us <- gadm("USA", level = 1, path = tempdir())
us <- st_as_sf(us)

us_data <- us |> 
  left_join(state_unemployment, by = c("NAME_1" = "State"))
```


```{r}

us<- gadm( "USA", level = 1, path = getwd())

us <- st_as_sf(us) |>
  filter (NAME_1= "Alaska", NAME_1= "Hawaii")

tm_shape(us) +
  tm_polygons(id = "NAME_1")
```
